item.title: 3 broken and rocking slabs, 24th November
item.description:
I have raised this issue before as the 3 broken slabs are outside my house. When this was first raised it was because an old lady tripped and fell over the uneven slabs and this was marked as not required to fix. Now with the rain the water has seeped beneath the slabs which are more unstable and while running down the pavement my 2 year old tripped on the slab (1 raised higher than the other) and went face first hitting his head. This is an immediate risk to fall with 3 uneven broken slabs with are rocking. Please can this be taken seriously and repaired. It is outside my driveway so the car passes over this daily and will get worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hansol Road, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Garden waste fly tipped, 24th November
item.description:
The family who live at 10 Oslo square have fly tipped the cuttings from pruning a large tree within their garden. They have fly tipped the garden waste, in the usual site they fly tipp at, on a weekly basis and have done so for many years. They are clearly emboldened to get away with fly tipping and be a problem for all that live near them because nothing seems to be done to stop their actions by the council.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Norway Gate, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Slippery leaves, 24th November
item.description:
I live in Bethersden Close Beckenham BR3 1PE and yet again Nobody has come and cleared the leaves. The street cleaning crew attending copers cope road today 24th nov blowing the leaves for the road sweeper thing to suck them up but as usual they never came into Bethersden Close BR3 1PE. We pay £150 for a parking permit but it is never cleaned and the cleaning crew never attend here. Please can you send a cleaning crew to Bethersden Close BR31PE to clean and sweep the leaves and rubbish from the road. Ideally someone with a blower who can blow leaves and rubbish into a pile for the road sweeper thing to suck up
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bethersden Close, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking view when exiting driveway., 24th November
item.description:
The vehicle has not moved since early October. The MOT expires at the end of November. It has made it impossible to see traffic approaching when trying to pull out of the drive.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayes Lane, Hayes, Greater London

item.title: Approximately 10 inch pothole in the middle of the road at the junction of Westerham Drive and Blackfen Road, 24th November
item.description:
